question: how do you know you have head lice?
question_content:
i have dry scalp and i know i have a bit of dandruff.
i have black thick hair. i just took a shower and i combed my hair but i didnt see anything nothing white or brown. please tell me how to be sure you have head lice. thanks

answers.answer_content:
Your hair is itchy around the hairline and the ears

Also, if you comb it out with a small comb, small eggs and actual lice can be found

Good Luck ( and i hope for you sake you don't have them! ) :D

Well when your hair is wet you should be able to see white to medium yellow little specks in your hair that is you look at them closely and long enough you'll see them hopping around in your hair. Also lice eggs (which will be in your hair if you have lice) are able to tell apart from dandruff because dandruff you can just shake your head and it'll come right out but lice eggs stick to your hair making it that you have to pull it out. You should just check with you doctor or have a parent or teacher check. Good luck!

If you scalp is very itchy and also you can get special combs in any chemists for checking,ask the pharmacist for it. To use it in my opinion i comb from top of scalp to the ends of my hair and then wipe the comb on a white piece of kitchen roll and then you can see clearly if you have any.!!!!!!!!
